newsitem.title: USA: AMBAC qualifies six muni issues for bond insurance.
newsitem.headline: AMBAC qualifies six muni issues for bond insurance.

text.p: AMBAC Indemnity Corp. said Wednesday it qualified for bond insurance the following six municipal issues scheduled for competitive sale today:
--Rio Rancho, N.M., $5 million general obligation bonds.
--Herkimer County, N.Y., $5.5 million GO public improvement bonds.
--Monroe Woodbury Central School District, N.Y., $47.5 million GOs.
--Tennessee Housing Development Agency, $65 million remarketing bonds.
--Harris County Water Control District No. 92, Texas, $1.22 million water and sewer revenue bonds.
